reviews.review_msg: Peter's the most humble and down-to-earth prof I've ever met. The class content and readings are difficult, but he takes the time to walk us through and listen to everyone's input during discussions. His classes are an absolute delight. Take the time to go to his office hours, too.

Takes the time to thoroughly explain concepts and make sure students understand. He doesn't lecture in the traditional sense and puts more of an emphasis on class discussions, but overall is a very fair marker, helpful and a great instructor to have. Definitely one of the easier 400 level instructors.

Peter Cramer made my undergrad twice, maybe three times as good as it would have been without him. The courses I took with him have informed my ways of thinking, reading and writing. I agree with a previous reviewer on the point of his distracting smile and good looks. If you are interested in the English language, his courses are not to be missed.
AWESOME TEACHER!!!! The entire class is discussion, so if you don't like talking don't take this class! He is the BEST teacher at SFU! He actually makes English interesting!! Best class!!
Awesome professor. Helpful, gives good feedback on essays and makes seminars fun. I'd recommend anyone to take his upper level rhetoric class. :)
